title: Spirit guard udyr Joke, taunt, and dance bugged
body: The spirit guard udyr sound files are messed up. Udyr is only saying his bear stance joke, taunt and dance regardless of what stance he is in. This has been a bug for a long time now (since around October) and I thought it would have been fixed already but it still hasn't. Please fix this

replies.body:
Hey KingSpooky,

We're currently still working on a fix for this issue. 

Ultimate skins are bit more complicated in terms of how they're hooked up - especially someone like Udyr where he's got several stances. Sorry this has taken so long. D:
Nice to see fixing a skins emotes are on yalls agenda. :)
